name: Paralysis
script:
if ak.ai() then return end
--ak.limbs.ParseonLine()
if IsTargetted(matches[2]) and affstrack.score.paralysis < 100 then 
  OppGainedAff("paralysis")
end
matches: ^Horror overcomes ([\w'\-]+)'s face as ([\w'\-]+) body stiffens into paralysis\.$
^([\w'\-]+) stiffens suddenly\, (his|her) features a masque frozen in agony\.$
^The body of ([\w'\-]+) locks in paralysis as [\w'\-]+ directs a short burst of arcane power in [\w'\-]+ direction\.$
^Lunging to the side\, [\w'\-]+ brings [\w'\-]+ shield around to smash into the spine of ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^[\w'\-]+ recites an epic tale of the heroism of Nicator to ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^Horror overcomes the face of ([\w'\-]+) as [\w'\-]+ body locks in paralysis\.$
